thread.title: BRIEF-Portland General Electric Reports Q4 Adjusted Non-Gaap Earnings Per Share $0.67

title: BRIEF-Portland General Electric Reports Q4 Adjusted Non-Gaap Earnings Per Share $0.67

organizations.name: brief-portland general electric reports q4 adj

text: February 16, 2018 / 10:15 AM / Updated 26 minutes ago BRIEF-Portland General Electric Reports Q4 Adjusted Non-Gaap Earnings Per Share $0.67 Reuters Staff Feb 16 (Reuters) - Portland General Electric Co: * PORTLAND GENERAL ELECTRIC REPORTS 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS AND INITIATES 2018 EARNINGS GUIDANCE * Q4 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.48 * SEES FY 2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.10 TO $2.25 * Q4 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.67 * SEES ‍A DECLINE IN RETAIL DELIVERIES BETWEEN 0 AND 1 PERCENT, WEATHER ADJUSTED IN 2018​ * ‍SEES OPERATING AND MAINTENANCE COSTS BETWEEN $575 AND $595 MILLION IN 2018​ * QTRLY REVENUE $515 MILLION VERSUS $524 MILLION LAST YEAR * SEES ‍DEPRECIATION AND AMORTIZATION EXPENSE BETWEEN $365 MILLION AND $385 MILLION IN 2018​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
